items.summary:
Following the usual November schedule, LEGO’s Insiders Weekend will go live today with member-only promotional savings, and this will likely be a big scramble for folks looking to score soon-to-be-retired sets before they officially sell out and are gone from LEGO’s digital shelves forever. This short-term event comes a week ahead of LEGO’s upcoming Black Friday event on November 28, 2025, and offers a bunch of promotions including multiple Insider points with purchases, GWPs, redeemable rewards, sweepstakes entries, and more.
